CC3C0A8F.FlavorText: A stained scroll written by an Orbei monk.

F2CA04D8.NoticeSignText: In my dreams, a figure bathed in Light, named Izzoth, came and spoke words of great power. I have written them down and placed the scroll at Khotunâ€™s Reach where only the faithful will find it. Seek the first trail marker at the graveyard of ships.
